overview: Peach Girls are good...good enough to eat. Don't take our word for it? Then feast your eyes on this yummy serving of Peach Girls. When you put girls this sweet together, they can't help take a little taste... and ask for seconds. You might want to have plenty of napkins around when you sink your teeth into this delicious DVD. Tastes Like a Peach... wet, juicy and always satisfies.
title: Tastes Like a Peach
